title: Languanizr language package
description: Languanizr is a smart multilanguage toolkit for websites.

words.5: Create multi language sites simple and fast.
words.9: Static and dynamic text, tag attributes, static input values.
words.11: Include languanizr.js, create language packages, prepare markup. Done!
words.15: Super fast language packages with the language editor.
words.17: User friendly and fast editor for custom language packages.
words.19: Open-Source, use it for private or commercial projects. Licensed under MIT license.
words.21: Support all recent versions of Firefox and Chrome. TODO
